title: Can I Merge Patient Files?
body:
Can I merge patient files?
  Sometimes, providers encounter 2 duplicate or multiple patient files and want to merge these patient records but, unfortunately, MediRecords doesn't have this feature yet.
We highly suggest deactivating the patient file they wanted to remove/ delete and then updating the patient record they wanted to keep with all the correct information. 
How Do I Deactivate a Patient Record?
